name: Ascendence
description:
Ascendence fits the theme vaguely in three different forms- first, in the fashion of art. All game elements seem like they are neon lights, or some sort of supernova-esque creation.

Secondly, in the form of enlightenment, the player goes through different forms of self-improvement, by learning about different virtues and how they reflect to challenge.

Thirdly, the classic rivalry of lightness and dark.

Oh- I forgot, also the colors... Color is our part of light that is visible, so... there's t hat theme too. 

Made by John Chapple in GameMaker Studio.

#KSUGameJam
